select count(*) from interview_maintain_view
where inter_date between #{date_begin} and #{date_end}
where inter_user_id like '%'||#{in_id}||'%' or inter_bomi_id like '%'||#{in_id}||'%'
where inter_status like '%'||#{in_status}||'%'
where inter_center like '%'||#{in_center}||'%'

select * from (select rownum as num, inter_no, inter_user_id, inter_user_name, to_char(inter_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD ') as inter_date, inter_time || '시' as inter_time, inter_center , inter_status from (select * from interview_maintain_view where inter_bomi_id = #{value} order by inter_date)) order by num desc

select * from (select rownum as num, inter_no, NVL(inter_status,'돌보미배정중') as inter_status, to_char(inter_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD ') as inter_date, inter_time || '시' as inter_time, nvl(inter_bomi_name,'미배정') as inter_bomi_name, INTER_CENTER, to_char(inter_req_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD ') as inter_req_date from(select * from interview_maintain_view where inter_user_id = #{value} order by inter_req_date)) order by num desc

select * from (select rownum as num, inter_no, inter_user_id, inter_user_name, inter_date, inter_time, NVL(inter_status, '돌보미배정중') as inter_status, NVL(inter_bomi_id, '미배정') as inter_bomi_id, NVL(inter_bomi_name, '미배정') as inter_bomi_name, inter_req_date, inter_center from(select * from interview_maintain_view
where inter_date between #{date_begin} and #{date_end}
where inter_user_id like '%'||#{in_id}||'%' or inter_bomi_id like '%'||#{in_id}||'%'
where inter_status like '%'||#{in_status}||'%'
where inter_center like '%'||#{in_center}||'%'
order by inter_req_date, inter_date, inter_time))
where num >= #{startList} and num <= #{endList}
order by num desc
